sentences.sContent: Note that you must use the same variant of this option for all compiler runs related to the same project.
sentences.sContent_eng: Note that you must use the same variant of this option for all compiler runs related to the same project.
sentences.sCn: 注意，对于所有运行的与同一个项目相关的编译器，必须使用这个选项的相同变体。

sentences.sContent: Product variant: This is a product that is based on another product but with some different characteristics.
sentences.sContent_eng: Product variant: This is a product that is based on another product but with some different characteristics.
sentences.sCn: 产品变体：这是一种基于另一种产品但具备一些不同特性的产品。

sentences.sContent: A locale is said to be a language only variant of another locale if it has only language code and that language code is the same as that for another locale.
sentences.sContent_eng: A locale is said to be a language only variant of another locale if it has only language code and that language code is the same as that for another locale.
sentences.sCn: 如果某个区域设置仅有语言代码，且语言代码与另一个区域设置相同，则将第一个区域设置称为第二个区域设置的语言变体。

words.tran: 多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
变化；[生物] 变异，变种
变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: something that is slightly different from the usual form of something
